term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - flash vacuum pyrolysis (FVP)
term.title: flash vacuum pyrolysis

item.text: Thermal reaction of a molecule by exposing it to a short thermal shock at high temperature, usually in the gas phase.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2405. 'Nomenclature and terminology for analytical pyrolysis (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2407 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365112405)
